name: Super Mario Bros.
description: A platform game where players control Mario and Luigi to save Princess Toadstool.

name: The Legend of Zelda
description: An action-adventure game featuring the hero Link on a quest to rescue Princess Zelda.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A platform game where players control Sonic, a blue hedgehog with super speed.

name: Street Fighter II
description: A fighting game where players compete in martial arts battles.

name: Final Fantasy VII
description: An rpg game featuring Cloud Strife and his fight against the megacorporation Shinra.

name: Donkey Kong Country
description: A platform game where players control Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong to recover their stolen banana hoard.

name: Metroid
description: An action-adventure game featuring bounty hunter Samus Aran fighting space pirates.

name: Pac-Man
description: An arcade game where players control Pac-Man, navigating a maze and eating dots while avoiding ghosts.

name: Tetris
description: A puzzle game where players rotate and place falling tetrominoes to clear liNES.

name: Mega Man 2
description: An action-platformer game where players control Mega Man to defeat Dr. Wily.

name: Castlevania
description: An action-adventure game where players control Simon Belmont on a quest to defeat Dracula.

name: Mortal Kombat
description: A fighting game known for its brutal finishing moves and diverse characters.

name: GoldenEye 007
description: A first-person shooter game based on the James Bond film of the same name.

name: Star Fox
description: A 3D rail shooter game featuring the Star Fox team defending the Lylat system.

name: Resident Evil
description: A survival horror game where players explore a mansion filled with zombies.

name: Crash Bandicoot
description: A platform game where players control Crash Bandicoot to stop Dr. Neo Cortex.

name: Pokémon Red and Blue
description: An rpg game where players capture and train Pokémon to become the Pokémon Champion.

name: EarthBound
description: An rpg game following NESs and his friends on a quest to save the world from Giygas.

name: Banjo-Kazooie
description: A platform game where players control Banjo and Kazooie to stop the witch Gruntilda.

name: Spyro the Dragon
description: A platform game where players control Spyro, a young dragon, on a quest to rescue his fellow dragons.

name: F-Zero
description: A futuristic racing game where players compete in high-speed hovercraft races.

name: Chrono Trigger
description: An rpg game where players travel through time to prevent a global catastrophe.

name: Kirby’s adventure
description: A platform game where players control Kirby to recover the Star Rod and restore dreams.

name: Super Metroid
description: An action-adventure game featuring Samus Aran as she explores the planet Zebes.

name: Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: An action-adventure game where Link travels through time to stop Ganondorf.

name: Contra
description: A run-and-gun action game where players control soldiers fighting against alien invaders.

name: StarCraft
description: A real-time strategy game where players control one of three species in a war for dominance.

name: SimCity
description: A simulation game where players build and manage a city.

name: Duck Hunt
description: A light gun shooter game where players use the NES Zapper to shoot ducks.

name: NBA Jam
description: A sports game known for its over-the-top basketball action and catchphrases.

name: Galaga
description: An arcade shooter game where players control a spaceship and shoot down enemy aliens.

name: Frogger
description: An arcade game where players guide a frog across a busy road and river to safety.

name: Metal Gear Solid
description: An action-adventure stealth game where players control Solid Snake to prevent a nuclear disaster.

name: Gran Turismo
description: A racing simulation game known for its realistic graphics and driving physics.

name: Shenmue
description: An action-adventure game with open-world exploration and real-time combat.

name: SoulCalibur
description: A fighting game with weapon-based combat and a variety of characters.

name: The Sims
description: A life simulation game where players create and control people in a virtual world.

name: Super Smash Bros.
description: A fighting game where characters from various Nintendo franchises battle it out.

name: Mario Kart 64
description: A racing game where characters from the Mario universe race in go-karts.
